item.title: 8.8 magnitude quake latest: Volcano erupts in Russia, tsunami waves reach California
item.description: Tsunami alerts were issued for Alaska and Hawaii on Tuesday after a major, 8.8 magnitude earthquake struck off the coast of Russia, according to offic...

item.title: WATCH: Stray kitten joins rat race aboard New York City subway
item.description: A stray kitten who went viral after boarding a New York City subway train last week has been adopted by a fellow commuter.

item.title: US economy grew more than expected as Trump's tariffs took hold
item.description: The U.S. economy has largely defied fears of a tariff-induced downturn.

item.title: WATCH: Frightened motorist drives through flooded tunnel
item.description: Severe thunderstorms caused flash flooding around Detroit Metro Airport.

item.title: WATCH: Russian doctors continue surgery despite earthquake
item.description: Doctors in Russia continued surgery on a patient despite a powerful magnitude 8.8 earthquake striking.
